thread.title: Jeff Morton
thread.title_full: Print All Over Me reviewed by Jeff Morton

author: Jeff Morton
title: Jeff Morton
text: Sharon is the name of the PAOM Agent who has assisted me over the past months, and in every case the replies to my questions have been quick and helpful. All issues have been resolved in a professional and satisfactory manner, and I remain a very happy customer. :) Thank you Sharon and PAOM Team! The clothing and printing services you offer are great, and your assistance team takes a personal and human approach that is truly appreciated. I always feel welcome to reach out with any questions I have, and I will continue to use your services.
